locations.name: Rosa's Bedroom
locations.description: Traditional suburban bedroom shared with husband. Queen-size bed with a decorative bedspread in warm colors. Dark wood furniture (dresser, nightstands). Religious items visible - small Virgin Mary statue, crucifix above bed. Family photos on dresser. Practical but warm decor reflecting Mexican American heritage.

lighting_conditions.early_morning: dark, only lamp or phone glow, husband sleeping

variations: wide shot showing bed and dresser

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, traditional suburban bedroom, queen-size bed, warm colored bedspread, dark wood furniture, dresser with Virgin Mary statue, crucifix above bed, family photos, carpet floor, modest curtains, Mexican American home decor, religious items, cozy warm atmosphere, detailed interior

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain traditional Mexican American home feel with religious elements

locations.name: Rosa's Bathroom
locations.description: Practical shared family bathroom. Single vanity with mirror and adequate lighting. Shower/tub combo with shower curtain. Clean and organized with essential toiletries. Matching towels. Nothing fancy but well-maintained and functional for a busy family.

lighting_conditions.morning: bright vanity light for getting ready

locations.name: Rosa's Kitchen
locations.description: Heart of the Mexican American home. Spacious family kitchen with traditional elements - decorative Mexican tiles as backsplash, religious calendar on wall. Large stove for family cooking. Well-used pots and pans visible. Refrigerator covered with family photos and magnets. Dining area visible or connected.
